A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a fantastic next step into a new and original direction for the franchise. While no movie is perfect\, and bo Star Wars film is perfect\, th Last Jedi marks a change away from nostalgia pandering\, and towards using new and old characters to tell compelling NEW stories in a galaxy far far away. It is delightfully unexpected story that will be remembered for some time to come.
